reviews.review: This game while fun is very one sided. While you can get some perks to fight against the monsters it's nowhere near the power the monsters have. Too many times they can lunge like 10 feet ta get ya, and sadly they give little ta know help to survivors.  Very disappointed. The new dlc characters are way to over powered

O problema de Bugs continua; MMR problemático; aumentou os jogadores "Cheaters" no jogo; 
 dev mandando consumidor a jogar civilization; qualquer falha da BHVR quer pagar com Bloodpoints; perda massiva de jogadores levando uma demora na espera de partida e fatalmente colocando jogadores Tryhard contra jogadores casuais ou iniciantes; falta de mapas já que eles criam várias versões dos mesmos mapas, além do Control C e V do mapa do Clow e Praga e por esses N motivos, eu não recomendo a gastar dinheiro com as DLCs ou Skins. Apenas comprem o jogo base que está de boa!

Szybka i miła giereczka. Osadzona w klimatach typu horror jednak ten klimat przestaje być odczuwalny po kilkunastu godzinach rozgrywki. Napewno mogę pochwalić tą gre za swoją kreatywność, stałe aktualizacje czy dosyć szybką pomoc techniczną. Jednak nic nie jest doskonałe, gra posiada do tej pory wiele bugów oraz ma dosyć słabe zabezpieczenie przed oszustami. Na szczęście w tej grze jest niewielu graczy przedkładających dobrą zabawe nad ucieczkę z mapy. Na dodatek wszystkie wyłapane błędy są sukcesywnie naprawiane tak, że później nie można się doszukać pozostałości ich istnienia. Gra ta bardzo mnie wciągnęła i miałem przy niej masę frajdy. A przecież jeszcze nie skończyłem! Nie wiem jak wy, ale ja ide dalej grać w tą nadal rozwijaną gre.
Amazing

naprawde dobra giereczka. towarzyszy mi przy niej kropla adrenaliny. ogolem naprawde polecam ale krystian (steemen) to slaby gracz w nią. prosze o osobiste nauczenie go zycia i grania w ta super giereczke gdyz psuje on mi jakze i innym towarzyszą rozgrywke swoimi umiejetnosciami ktore nie przekraczaja poziomu podlogi :( dziekuje za uwage i prosze reaportowac steemen'a :)

The game suffers from a series of bad design decisions which lead to a terrible in game balance, bugs that should of never shipped, and a very clueless design staff who are more interested in crafting lore and a world than creating a mechanically fun game. The game has nuggets of fun, especially at the lower ranks of the game, but the problems with the design become crystal clear as your reach the upper ranks of players. Feedback from the community is generally met with a deaf ear feeling or hand waved away, creating a bad feeling in the player base and an unwillingness to support development further. Stay away until things change, as it could be a really good game if the Devs put forth the effort, but nothing has shown me over the last year they have any interest in doing so.

Edit : Stay away, the game is rife with hacks and bugs. Do not play if you care about a fair experience. The Devs haven't made much of an effort to combat it either.

Okaay, Dead By Daylight. Where to start.

 Dead by Daylight is a 4 vs 1 semi-horror game where 1 person plays as a monsterous killer and the 4 are survivors. the killers job is to eliminate all survivors by slashing them with their unique weapons aned abilities twice (or once if you play the shape is some cases) and gruesomely hang them up by their necks on hooks. the survivors objective is to work as a team to repair generators, find the exits and escape while hiding from the terrifying killer. I love this game with a passion due to its very interesting gameplay mechanics (which are well polished for the most part) and its interesting character design. Now the game is no where near perfect with some very prominetn balancing and matchmaking issues but very few multiplayers are perfectly balanced and polished all round bit more on that later. 

Firstly i would like to adress how the game works and why i like it. there is alot of strategy surrounding this game and many ways to approach each game including different strategies for each map and taking into account which of the 10 killers (currently) in the game and what they do for instance the flagship killer "the trapper" puts down bear traps which alert him when survivors are caught in them. Survivors will try to be more careful in this situation as they obviously dont want to be caught. the variety is immensly fun despite the slighltly over powered killers which have made me exclaim WTF on more than one occasion such as the wraith who can go invisible or the shape who can essentially put people to the floor in one hit where as it takes every other killer two in total. So the health system is very different to many other games that you may have played. each survivor must be hit twice in order to be downed. once downed, the killer can pick them up and hang them on hooks. teamates of the survivor can pull people off of the hooks however with killers usually just camping the hooks, this can be very difficult but hey thats just how the game is. when hit the survivors will also start bleeding which leaves a slighlty obsure trail for the killer to follow however this is not suer visible like survivors running marks so it is in fact balanced. other survivors can heal damaged ones and stop them from bleeding or survivors can heal themselves with medpacks. I love this game as i do think that for the most part it is balanced mechanic wise and it does work really well for both killer and survivor (especially when playing with some friends as survivor)

now onto perks, yaaay. each character for survivor and killer has perks and addons for items (survivor) and abilities (killer). i will be perfectly honest in saying that this confused me for quite a while as there is no real in game tutorial telling you what everything means. Just reletivley vaugue descriptions for some perks and even some killers abilites which are very important. Some things do speak for themself though such as luck or increase sprint speed. My point is, or more than one occasion was i looking stuff up about dead by daylight as the descriptions in game were not very helpful. you unlock perks which you can permanently attatch to your character through the bloodweb or the shrine. These are very uselful in most cases such as "iron grasp" for the killer which makes it harder for survivors to wiggle out of their grip when they are picked up. addons are a one time use item which buff up your items and abilities. the vast majority of these are balanced. Adoons are also purchased from the bloodweb by spending bloodpoints which are earned through playing matches and doing daily rituals which act like quests. these give a huge amount of bloodpoints for the newer players. all in all, the blood web system works pretty consistently despite some balancing issues with some perks.

Now to adress the main problems that the game has. Here we go. The biggeest issue for me is some of the balancing issues. For instance i personally despise the wraith as i have stated earlier on who can go invisible and moves considerably faster and with some addons completley discards the timer it takes hop in and out of invisibility to attack. i also think some perks are very stong such as freddy kruegers perk that makes generators practically impossible to repair. I also think that the idea of DLC is fine but only if they are balanced aws well which some are not. For instance, the most recent DLC (at the time of this review) is the Nightmare on elm street where Freddy Krueger is very strong right now and the fact that he needs to be paid for is a problem .And finally, the game is marketed as a horror game and it deos this reletivley well at the very start. It reminded me of classic horror movies like Friday the 13th however as you play more the scare factor wears off and it does become your standard muliplayer experience. 

Overall i would just like to say that i love this game even though i havnt plaed it for a super long time despite some of its balancing issues and some bugs.

I absolutely love this game, its fun to play as survivor and killer, it takes quite a bit of skill to play as both, very fun to play with your friends and I completely recommend it. What I dislike about this game is the community, the community isn't exactly a nice collection of people. Most people are very salty about what you do in this game. It is very frusturating sometimes with this game. Another thing I dislike is that it seems that the killers are more favoured over the survivors. These are the only problems I have with this amazing game. Again, I recommend it, its fun to play. Those are just the two flaws I find with it(This is just my personal viewpoint, there is tons of nice people out there in the Dead By Daylight community) If you decide to get this game, it is worth the 20 dollars. I have had tons of hours of gameplay with this game and I still am going to continue to play this game.

Ich als Neuling bin begeistert. Sicher, ich hab auch schon das Campen mitbekommen nur war ich da einer derjenigen, die in aller Ruhe die Generatoren reparieren und fliehen konnten. Daher sehe ich diese Taktik nicht unbedingt als verwerflich an(da sie ja auch dem Killer nicht wirklich was bringt). Die DLC's sind nicht wirklich nötig sondern bringen lediglich etwas Farbe ins Game. Der einzige Schönheitsfehler ist für mich die Zusammensetzung der Matches. Als ich Lvl. 1 war, hatte ich einige Male Killer, die sichtbar nicht sehr hochgelevelt waren. Dann aber plötzlich welche, die mich schon nach ca. 1 Minute hatten. Ich hoffe Mal, es gibt Einschränkungen mit welchen Leveln man zusammengeschmissen wird, da ansonsten der Frustfaktor bei Neulingen sehr schnell steigt und sie das Game zurückgeben.
The game is only good on sale. Otherwise the community is utter garbage, you all suck. Kys.

まず煽り耐性の低い人はお勧めできません
ですが、やられて今度こそはやってやると思える人は必然的に強くなるので、このゲームはお勧めです
さすがに、回線抜きする奴は居なくなって欲しいですがライトを点滅させたり板の前で屈伸や音を立てるのは
揺動作戦です。自分が煽られてる＝カッとなるのではなく、冷静に状況判断して逃げる生存者を追い詰めるのが
このゲームの醍醐味ですし、殺人鬼側は生存者を必ずしも倒す必要はありません。
開始早々に４人を吊った（倒した）としてもポイントは低いですこのゲームは如何に相手を苦しめるかなので
ゴール前で屈伸してるなら殴ってあげましょう相手にもポイントが入りますし、もちろんこちらにもポイントが
入りますのでそこは怒らずに、ポイントゴチでいいと思います。

Bel passatempo quando non si ha nulla da fare, è pieno di bug, fin troppi, dopo una partita mi ritrovo i bug pure nella vita reale
Non provate a cercare un partita da killer, N O N  P R O V A T E C I, il gioco vi metterà automaticamente in una black list dove dovrete aspettare all'incirca 492 anni nettunali, beh il FACECAMPING, porca putroccola cicciona (niente parolacce o steam mi perm-banna) chi fa il facecamping probabilmente è un nerd obeso con i brufoli pure sulla cappella, ti si piazza sto bestione davanti a te sul gancio e ti guarda tutta la partita...MA CHE  C A Z Z O  GUARDI? non azzardatevi a giocare una partita senza un vostro amico, perchè tutti gli altri sopravvissuti si faranno i cazzi loro e andranno a rovistare nelle ceste manco fosse un hunger game su minecraft, poi giustamente il killer insegue solo te. Mi sono incazzato talmente tante volte che da sopravvissuto ho inseguito il killer e l'ho messo sul gancio.
7.5/10
